Hi,

I am Drag146. I am a 14 (nearly 15) years old boy from Lithuania, a small country in Europe. I play KSP for about week and a half and I really like it. I have landed on a MÃƒÂ¼n, put some rovers there. I have launched a couple sattelites around Kerbin.

And now I want You to give me some tips of how to build a rocket with a small part count that is capable of flying to Duna. And could You recommend some fun mods?

Thanks in advance,

Drag146.
